name: Laser Escape
description:
Created for ZenoJam 3! If you Experience issues with HTML5, please try the Windows download!

In a distant future, peace negotiations have fallen flat, leading to the eradication of the human population. Humanity's last legacy rests with Bobby, a simple archive bot with the last remnants of human knowledge left on the desolate planet. Unfortunately for Bobby, he has fallen into range of a planet-harvesting laser and must fight the forces pulling him to his death to preserve the last piece of humanity.

HOW TO PLAY

A and D = Move Left/Right

Space = Jump/Double Jump

Up and Down Arrow Keys = Volume Control

Escape = Close Game

Game ends if Bobby touches the Laser, avoid the pull of the laser and the various hazards being sucked into the beam. Bobby gets pulled in harder over time and hazards start appearing faster as the game progresses. Try to survive for as long as you can!

Credits

"Press Start" Font - by Codeman38 on dafont.com, listed as 100% Free.

Music from 8-Bit music pack by CodeManu on opengameart.org, licensed under creative commons 3.0 allowing personal and commercial use: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/legalcode https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-music-pack-loopable

Sound Effects - Created with SFXR
